thread.title: Spotted: Rashford jokes around with Man United players in training as star trio sit out
thread.title_full: Spotted: Rashford jokes around with Man United players in training as star trio sit out

title: Spotted: Rashford jokes around with Man United players in training as star trio sit out
text: Spotted: Rashford jokes around with Man United players in training as star trio sit out MARCUS RASHFORD was in a good mood during Manchester United's latest training session as the Red Dveils prepare to face Saint-Etienne in their Europa League last-32 clash on Thursday (8.05pm). PUBLISHED: 14:01,  16, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 Man United stars joke around in training ahead of Saint-Eteinne clash Wed, February 15, 2017 The Manchester United squad looked in a relaxed mood as they trained ahead of Thursday's Europa League clash with Saint-Etienne (8.05pm), but Jose Mourinho was struggling to crack a smile
